title: PlantBased Exmouth
typeOfFood: Vegan, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, British, English
description: A vegan cafe and juice bar opened Feb 2016. Serves carrot cake, coffee, juices, soups, filled rolls, avocado hummus, pesto toasties, chili and nachos. Also on premises is a micro wholefood shop. Child-friendly with a discreet play area hidden away under the stairs.
